Introduction

Visit the Hugo website!

item.title: About
item.description:
This website

This website is inspired by Bear blog. We believe that there is a “website obesity crisis.” Bloated websites are full of scripts, ads, and trackers slowing us down, diverting our attention, and distracting our focus.

This website is the opposite. It is small — each pageload is just ~5kb, about 50,000 times smaller than a vertical video — and focused on exactly one thing: information flow. The website contains no scripts, trackers, cookies or snooping analytics.
